Summary Note:
The RM met Emilia Anniina Mattila at a yacht party in Helsinki. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Emilia Anniina Mattila is a 49 year old Hedge Fund Manager from Finland.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Emilia Anniina Mattila is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Emilia received her secondary school diploma from Riihim√§en lukio in 1994.
Emilia graduated from Aalto University in 2000, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 26 years, Emilia Anniina Mattila has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At Danske Bank A/S, Emilia Anniina Mattila held the position of Investment Banker from 1999 to 2002, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Private Equity Investor at OP Financial Group, where she continued to grow professionally from 2002 to 2003.
Her tenure as a Hedge Fund Manager at Danske Bank A/S from 2004 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 610000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns condo in Kauniainen, where she resides. It is worth 820000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, she received an inheritance of 4620000 EUR in 2008, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
